title: Patch error 004 optional fix.
body: Try putting your pc to safe boot then  with networking enabled  restart your pc and then update the client then after its done just put your pc to normal boot and restart again.Hope this helps,

replies.body: Those 004 errors typically point to some kind of [**permissions**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/204134104-Setting-up-your-Permissions) error between your OS and the program you're trying to run, but ayyyyy whatever helps!
